metadata.title: Luciano Adamczuk - Portfolio
metadata.description: I am an enthusiastic frontend developer, dedicated to creating dynamic and user-friendly web experiences. My passion lies in transforming ideas into captivating interfaces, where every detail matters to enhance user interaction. I'm motivated by the challenge of achieving a balance between design and functionality, creating accessible and effective solutions. I'm always eager to learn and grow, bringing fresh ideas and a solid work ethic to make a positive and lasting impact on each project.

pageHome.subtitle: - Being part of the IT world -
pageHome.title: Luciano Adamczuk

description.title: Introduction
paragraph: I am Luciano Alejandro Adamczuk, born on July 19, 1996, in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

I am known for being cheerful, sociable, and easygoing. Ever since I discovered how code fragments can transform into visual experiences, I developed a deep passion for technology and decided to focus on web development.

Driven by the desire to create intuitive and attractive interfaces, I constantly strive to improve and deepen my knowledge in the frontend world. I am excited about the opportunity to learn and grow within a team, always bringing fresh ideas and a committed attitude to each project.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
paragraph: I believe in honesty, analysis, and projection as pillars in my life.
I am motivated to acquire skills that allow me to be versatile, tackling each challenge with realism.

I have learned from colleagues and mentors, always complementing with self-learning. For me, success is measured in the stability and security I can provide to my family, integrating my professional and personal life towards that purpose.

beyondTheCode.title: Beyond the Code
paragraph: - I love reading, especially novels, theology, and philosophy, which challenge me to see life from new perspectives.
- Dancing is one of my passions; with years of experience, I see it as a unique form of expression.
- Gym enthusiast, always striving to push myself in every sport I engage in.
- Music is part of me: guitar, percussion, and a bit of singing to express myself.
- Favorite food: Pizza! It's always a good time to share it... or maybe be selfish?
- I've always dreamed of flying, for the feeling of freedom and movement.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Next JS
technologiesDescriptions.description: Next.js is a React framework for developing fast and scalable web applications. It offers features like server-side rendering, static site generation, and dynamic routing.

technologiesDescriptions.name: CSS Modules
technologiesDescriptions.description: CSS Modules is a technique for managing styles in web projects, where each CSS file is scoped only to the component that imports it, preventing class conflicts.

technologiesDescriptions.name: TypeScript
technologiesDescriptions.description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and object-oriented features, enhancing code scalability, maintainability, and safety.

technologiesDescriptions.name: i18n
technologiesDescriptions.description: Internationalization (i18n) is the process of designing an application so it can be adapted to different languages and regions without needing code restructuring.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Responsive Design
technologiesDescriptions.description: Responsive Design is a web design approach that ensures web pages look good on a variety of devices and screen sizes by using techniques like media queries.

technologiesDescriptions.name: React Hook Form
technologiesDescriptions.description: React Hook Form is a library for handling forms in React applications. It simplifies form validation and state management using hooks.

technologiesDescriptions.name: UX UI
technologiesDescriptions.description: UX (User Experience) and UI (User Interface) refer to user experience and user interface, respectively. UX/UI design aims to create products that are easy to use, accessible, and visually appealing.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Adobe Illustrator
technologiesDescriptions.description: Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphic design tool used to create logos, illustrations, and other complex graphics.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Tailwind CSS
technologiesDescriptions.description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows for rapid creation of custom and modern interfaces with predefined classes applied directly to HTML elements.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Framer Motion
technologiesDescriptions.description: Framer Motion is an animation library for React that enables smooth, complex animations with a focus on simplicity and performance.

technologiesDescriptions.name: React
technologiesDescriptions.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly in single-page applications, using a component-based approach.

technologiesDescriptions.name: CSS
technologiesDescriptions.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a styling language used to describe the presentation of an HTML document, controlling the visual style and layout of web pages.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Bootstrap
technologiesDescriptions.description: Bootstrap is a web design framework based on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that makes it easy to develop responsive web pages with a consistent user interface.

technologiesDescriptions.name: SCSS
technologiesDescriptions.description: SCSS (Sassy CSS) is an extension of CSS that adds advanced features like variables, nesting, mixins, and inheritance to make writing and organizing styles easier.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Swiper
technologiesDescriptions.description: Swiper is a JavaScript library for creating responsive and touch-friendly carousels and sliders. It's widely used in both web and mobile applications.

technologiesDescriptions.name: Adobe Photoshop
technologiesDescriptions.description: Adobe Photoshop is an image editing software mainly used for graphic design, photo manipulation, and creating visual content.
